title: odyssey onslaught
body:
so ive got 20 losses in a row sitting nicely in my match history. i cant even pass onslaught with a normal team, let alone one with specific champions, or limited augments. I'm in dire need of a group of competent players to get my quests done, since pugs just aren't working.
my quests right now are...
win on onslaught, 
win with everyone using 4 or less augments, 
and win with everyone using the same champion.

replies.body:
add me SWEET3CC

all augs, play malphite really well. send us a msg well smash it
